alert.note: Alert for Wayne (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 6:59PM EDT until July 07 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WAYNE COUNTY... At 657 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Fremont to near Goldsboro to 9 miles west of Walnut Creek, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 648pm, the public reported quarter size hail 4 miles north-northeast of Elroy. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Goldsboro, Walnut Creek, Pikeville, Mar-Mac, Brogden, Elroy and Cliffs Of The Neuse State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
